review: With AFTV, Amazon Prime, and Netflix, we enjoy the best programming wherever we have a Wi-Fi connection and HDTV, Kindle Fire HDX, or PC! A pleasure to catch up on fine American and British series, free HBO and Showtime series and comedy specials, and niche membership channels like Gaiam TV.Don't be intimidated by the technology. Switching between Amazon Fire TV and satellite service is a cinch!We're still tethered to Dish TV for a variety of HD "cable" channels, including Fox News, TNT, TCM, AHC, OWN, ID, History, H2, Discovery, PBS channels, and local and national broadcast channels. We use TWC for high-speed PC Internet connection, since we lose Dish service during heavy storms.I'm open to suggestions for reducing satellite and or cable costs.

review: I love this little box - it's zippy, responsive, workhorse and is great for Amazon Instant Video and Netflix.  We use this as our primary entertainment and it just does its thing.Another great feature is it lets you sideload android apps easily so you can upload your android apps even if they're not part of the Amazon store!Knocking one star off for a not so great app offering and a tedious means of shopping for them, but only one star since it's easy to sideload the apps.
